column4: hello, I have installed ubuntu on an old pIII laptop and I'm trying to free as much ram as I can. She doesn't need ssh-agent and seahorse-agent to be started everytime ; I cannot find it in the session starting programs. How can I disable it ?
thanks, but it's nowhere to be found in bum
ps aux | grep seahorse states otherwise
I'm afraid I don't know what happened then...I never meddled much with services
